public class WanderBehaviour
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action

This class represents the behaviour of wandering around aimlessly

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action getAction​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor actor, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.GameMap map)
